name: Roulette Casino Vegas
description:
Spin the luxury wheel in landscape mode in Roulette Casino Vegas. Push your luck and become a millionaire! Come every day and spin the lucky wheel for a free prize!

Enjoy Roulette Casino Vegas and play at friendly betting tables with easy controls in horizontal mode.

Try your roulette tactics without risking your money and become a Professional Roulette Player.

Prepare for Las Vegas!

- No ads

- Free chips every day

- Premium casino feeling

- No internet connection needed


Best offline roulette app ever!
